
#include <iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int P,Q,b,R,S,carry,i=0;
	unsigned long long int sum=0;
	const int mod = 1000000;
	cin>>b;
	
	cin>>P;
	R = P;
	while(R>0){
	 carry = R%10;
	 R = R/10;
	 sum =  sum + carry*pow(b,i);
	 i++;
	// cout<<carry<<endl<<sum<<endl;
	}
	P = sum;sum=i=0;
	
	cin>>Q;
	S = Q;
	while(S>0){
	 carry = S%10;
	 S = S/10;
	 sum =  sum + carry*pow(b,i);
	 i++;
	 }
	Q = sum;sum=i=0;
	
	sum = P*Q;
	long rem,j=1,ans=0;
	do
    {
        rem=sum%b;
        ans=ans + (j*rem);
        sum=sum/b;
        j=j*10;
    }while(sum>0);
    
    ans = ans%mod;
    cout<<ans;
	return 0;
}
